title: Need help with Font
content:
Hello! I just need to figure out what this font is. Thank you!

author: Primehunter

comments.content:
I was helped with this earlier. I used ITC Bolt, and created the italic effect. Hope this helps.  
See my post [http://typophile.com/node/98976](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804124625/http:/typophile.com/node/98976 "http://typophile.com/node/98976").
